This website provides documentation for the lake liming application. 

The current pages are placeholders (in English). 

## Overview {#sec-overview}

The application performs two kinds of calculation:

 1. **[Lake modelling](./lake-modelling.qmd)**. Estimate the change in lake pH over time for a given lime dose (depending on the type of lime, lake characteristics and lime application method).

 2. Summarising data from **[column tests](./column-tests.qmd)**. Upload column test data using a standard template and calculate characteristic curves for **instantaneous dissolution** and **overdosing factor**.
